void pandora::PseudoLayerCalculator::InitializeGeometry (  )  [inline, protected, virtual]

Initialize pseudo layer calculator geometry information.

void pandora::PseudoLayerCalculator::ReadSettings ( const TiXmlHandle *const   pXmlHandle  )  [inline, protected, virtual]

Read pseudo layer calculator settings from xml.

This function will receive a callback if the top level xml tags <PseudoLayerCalculator></PseudoLayerCalculator> are present.

Parameters:
